ViewObject.Name: PropRegionCustGroupView
ViewObject.SelectList: PropRegionCustGroup.PROPOSAL_ID, PropRegionCustGroup.CUST_GROUP, (SELECT DISTINCT LISTAGG(AC.ATTRIBUTE3,'|') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY PRCG.PROPOSAL_ID, PRCG.CUST_GROUP) OVER (PARTITION BY PRCG.PROPOSAL_ID, PRCG.CUST_GROUP) AS REGION_CODE FROM PROP_REGION_CUST_GROUP PRCG, APPS.AR_CUSTOMERS AC, APP_USER_REGION AUR WHERE AC.ATTRIBUTE1 = PRCG.CUST_GROUP AND AC.ATTRIBUTE3 = AUR.REGION_CODE AND PRCG.PROPOSAL_ID = PropRegionCustGroup.PROPOSAL_ID AND PRCG.CUST_GROUP = PropRegionCustGroup.CUST_GROUP GROUP BY PRCG.PROPOSAL_ID, PRCG.CUST_GROUP, PRCG.CUST_GROUP, AC.ATTRIBUTE3) AS REGION_CODE

ViewAttribute.Name: RegionCode
ViewAttribute.Expression: SELECT DISTINCT LISTAGG(AC.ATTRIBUTE3,'|') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY PRCG.PROPOSAL_ID, PRCG.CUST_GROUP) OVER (PARTITION BY PRCG.PROPOSAL_ID, PRCG.CUST_GROUP) AS REGION_CODE FROM PROP_REGION_CUST_GROUP PRCG, APPS.AR_CUSTOMERS AC, APP_USER_REGION AUR WHERE AC.ATTRIBUTE1 = PRCG.CUST_GROUP AND AC.ATTRIBUTE3 = AUR.REGION_CODE AND PRCG.PROPOSAL_ID = PropRegionCustGroup.PROPOSAL_ID AND PRCG.CUST_GROUP = PropRegionCustGroup.CUST_GROUP GROUP BY PRCG.PROPOSAL_ID, PRCG.CUST_GROUP, PRCG.CUST_GROUP, AC.ATTRIBUTE3
